Fragments.Description: The original EPD functional unit was per item at 488kg per item- we have adjusted the functional unit to Mass (dividing the values by 488) to better reflect the dynamic weights of custom air handling units. An air handling unit (AHU) is a unit that helps to maintain indoor temperature and air flow in high quality
This was derived from a One Click product for a DN 25mm 3.9kg Air Separator.
Swegon Ceiling Diffuser 600 (3.53 kg, 595x595mm). The functional unit is per kg, we have scaled by 3.53 to make it per item.

Collective heat-only gas condensing boiler. This EPD's original functional unit was kW (/1000) and was a 187.1 kg boiler. This study is based on  the analysis of 9 collective heat-only gas condensing boilers, representative of the 2017 French market.
Category 6 LSZH LAN Cable
This EPD relates to cable support systems and applies to 1 running metre cable tray system.
The Swegon Parasol comfort modules operate on a basic principle that is closely akin to that of chilled beams - 22.6kg each.

The functional unit described in the EPD was for one ton of chilling capacity  (/3516 (Watts per Ton)). The declaration is based on the PCR document, “Water-cooled chillers,” year 2011. A centrifugal chiller is a machine that removes heat from a liquid via a vaporcompression cycle. The cooled liquid can then be circulated through a heat exchanger to cool air or equipment as required. The chiller utilizes the vaporcompression cycle to chill water and reject the heat collected from the chilled water  plus the heat from the compressor to a second water loop cooled by a cooling  tower.
Square D brand I-Line circuit breaker power distribution panelboards.
This was derived from a One Click product for a Cooling Tower that weighed 3575 kg/unit.

OTDC200E-2P is a robust DC Switch Disconnector for upto 1500V DC applications. It  provides reliable switching and isolation in a wide variety of applications. Its efficient  design makes your operations smoother and more sustainable.

OTDC32F3 is a robust DC Switch Disconnector for upto 1500V DC applications. It provides  reliable switching and isolation in a wide variety of applications. Its efficient design makes  your operations smoother and more sustainable.

OT400E03 is robust AC Switch Disconnector for upto 690V AC applications. It provides  reliable switching and isolation in a wide variety of applications. Its efficient design makes  your operations smoother and more sustainable.
This EPD is for Aluminum Metallic Coated Steel (ALCOT)
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019

External insulation on commercial or residential heating or air conditioning ducts in North America. It is suitable for the exterior of rectangular or round sheet metal ducts and spaces or surfaces where temperature and condensation must be controlled.

Versatile product for thermal and acoustical applications in North America such as: heating and air conditioning ducts, power and process equipment, boiler and stack installations, metal and masonry walls, wall and roof panel systems, curtain wall assemblies, and cavity walls.

Specifically designed for sheet metal ducts used in heating, ventilating, and air conditioning in North America. It provides an optimum combination of efficient sound absorption, low thermal conductivity, and minimal airstream surface friction.
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019
This was derived from a One Click product for a 200L Expansion Tank/Vessel weighing 38.1kg, its functional unit was per kg.
Carrier 42NH 0.6-12kW Cooling Capacity, 0.8-17kW Heating Capacity. Measured in kW, scaled by 1000 to Watts.

Different types of valves for system plants of different sectors. The process starts with the manufacturing of raw brass and  bronze pieces for valves obtained from casting and hot-moulding  (activities carried out by external subcontractors); then the pieces  are mechanically worked and assembled with valves components  (e.g. handles, gaskets, balls, fittings, etc.). Some pieces and valve  components are coated with chrome and powder, according to  the valve typologies in which they are used
Mallia DP Socket Outlet Switched 2 Gang
This EPD is for a Grundfos Magna3 Circulator Pump. The original functional unit was by item at 6.41kg per item. Each value has been divided by 6.41 to get the functional unit into mass.
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019

For the purpose of the MEP EPD dataset, this EPD is assumed to have a cross-functional purpose for sprinkler heads. Different types of valves for system plants of different sectors. The process starts with the manufacturing of raw brass and  bronze pieces for valves obtained from casting and hot-moulding  (activities carried out by external subcontractors); then the pieces  are mechanically worked and assembled with valves components  (e.g. handles, gaskets, balls, fittings, etc.). Some pieces and valve  components are coated with chrome and powder, according to  the valve typologies in which they are used
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019

The switchgear weight is 407.18 kg, the functional unit is one item. ABB SafeRing Switchgear is a medium voltage gas insulated ring main unit for secondary distribution. The main function of the switchgears is to “establish and cut off the supply of a downstream installation from an electrical and/or mechanical control and to protect people and premises at risk of fire or explosion against insulation defects”. S
The representative water closet works with 1.1-1.6 GPF or 4.2-6.0 LPF.
This PEP is for an LPT 300 MVA ODAF Power Transformer. The functional unit is per item, we have scaled that to be per Volt Amp (/ by 1,000,000).
The representative urinal works with 0.125-0.5 GPF or 0.5-1.9 LPF.
This is based on the Easy VEC Ultra 2500 m3/hr, average flow of 650 m3/h; 63.54kg. The functional unit is m3/hr, this has been scaled to m3/s (x 0.000277778)
PFSP CU up to 6mm2 1 kV with copper conductor. Functional unit 1A over 1km over a 30 year period. We have divided the values by 1000 to achieve per meter values.
This entry was provided by Quartz 2019
